room_title: Escape room "Dinosaur Detective" by Intrigue Escape Games in Mt Pleasant
room_address: 316 N Mission St Mt Pleasant, MI 48858
room_description: Your dinosaur scientist friend is missing! The night before she disappeared you received a desperate message from her asking for your help. She has made an unbelievable dinosaur discovery, but she said someone is out to steal it from her! She hid her discovery and left YOU clues to find it! Will those mini-dinosaurs lead you to answers? Is that dinosaur you see in the mirror trying to tell you something? You need to fish down a dinosaur’s throat for clue?! Full-sized dinosaurs would not fit into our facility, but the wall-to-wall dinosaur theming makes this escape room as fun as it is challenging. “Dinosaur Detective” is a really FUN mystery escape room! If you like dinosaurs, or just great mysteries, this is the escape room for you. Seeking “fun things to do in Mount Pleasant”? This is it! *NO dinosaur knowledge required!
